description: This file defines a class S3PDFReader that reads PDF documents stored on Amazon S3, utilizing the pypdf library for PDF parsing and asyncio for asynchronous operation. It includes methods for synchronous and asynchronous reading of PDF files, extracting text from each page, and generating Document objects with metadata.

classes.name: S3PDFReader
classes.description: A reader class for extracting text from PDF files stored on Amazon S3, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Synchronously reads a PDF file from an S3 object, extracts text from each page, and returns a list of Document instances.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a PDF file from an S3 object by running the synchronous read method in a separate thread.
